label: Behavior 46016396
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: 'following a curved maritime route (the persistent small differences between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and gradual course evolution, suggest the vessel is navigating a predefined curved channel or coastal bend; position progression follows an approximately linear trajectory in geographic coordinates with slight northeasterly curvature, modeled by a second-order polynomial: lat(t) ≈ 54.735883 - 0.000175 × t + 0.000002 × t², lon(t) ≈ 15.574525 - 0.00965 × t - 0.00008 × t², where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)'
